thread.title: Dave Schoenherr
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Dave Schoenherr

author: Dave Schoenherr
title: Dave Schoenherr
text: We went in knowing we were looking for a mattress and in which price range we wanted to be in. We were greeted at the door and taken over to the mattress section. We were shown quality mattresses and given ample time to test them out. We decided on a mattress and proceeded to check out which was simple and qucik. We scheduled delivery for Friday but do to a schedule conflict had to reschedule for Saturday. The delivery people were also very nice and quick.
